title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 16 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 16 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: The left used covid to scare people into giving up their freedom bit by bit. Will the L.A. County population fight back against this new mask mandate? Governor Newsom could use covid fears to distract from his recall election. Rush's Timeless Wisdom: Remember the All-American First Calvary Amazon Battalion. Clay: It's all emotion instead of facts. A spicy phone call from Pamela, a devout Fauciite double masker. Who pushes these stupid ideas -- is there a committee that decides the covid rules? Who is accountable for the covid fear-mongering?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
